actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Death Glare (Gaze)
actions.desc: One frightened creature within 30 feet makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw  the creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success  the creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Horrific Transformation
bonus_actions.desc: The hag briefly takes on a terrifying form or reveals its true form. Each creature within 30 feet that can see the hag makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn. If a creatures saving throw is successful, it is immune to the hags Horrific Transformation for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Curse
special_abilities.desc: A creature that makes a bargain with the hag is magically cursed for 30 days. While it is cursed, the target automatically fails saving throws against the hags scrying and geas spells, and the hag can cast control weather centered on the creature.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The hags innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, disguise self, 1/day: control weather, geas, scrying
